questions.question: Which method is used to read a CSV file into a Pandas DataFrame?

explanations.a: Incorrect. There is no `load_csv()` method in Pandas.
explanations.b: Incorrect. `open_csv()` is not a valid method in Pandas.
explanations.c: Correct! The `pd.read_csv()` method is used to read CSV files into a Pandas DataFrame.
explanations.d: Incorrect. Pandas does not use `import_csv()` to read CSV files.

questions.question: Which of the following methods is used to display the first few rows of a DataFrame?

explanations.a: Incorrect. `start()` is not a valid method in Pandas.
explanations.b: Correct! `df.head()` is used to display the first few rows of a DataFrame.
explanations.c: Incorrect. `top()` is not a valid method in Pandas.
explanations.d: Incorrect. `show()` is used in PySpark, not Pandas.
